text: It is true he made a point of again being absent from Northern Rhodesia when his followers have indulged in such violence." But Sir Roy pointed out that a few months ago Mr. Kaunda said that if UNIP did not get its way what would happen would make the Mau Mau in Kenya "seem like a child's picnic."
handwritten_text: It is true he made a point of again being absent from Northern Rhodesia when his followers have indulged in such violence." But Sir Roy pointed out that a few months ago Mr. Kaunda said that if UNIP did not get its way what would happen would make the Mau Mau in Kenya "seem like a child's picnic."
